com.github.sviengine.glsurface

Class SVIGLSurface

  • java.lang.Object
    • GLSurfaceView
      • com.github.sviengine.glsurface.SVIGLSurface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SVISlideManager.SVISlideRequestRender

    public class SVIGLSurface
extends GLSurfaceView
implements SVISlideManager.SVISlideRequestRender
    SVIGLSurface Class extend GLSurfaceView and use openGL ES 2.0 for drawing screen

      • swapAnimationSVIGLSurface

        public void swapAnimationSVIGLSurface()
        swap animation SVIGLSurface this method call the native method. native method get instance and push the message in message que. then renderer read that message and rendering the surface.
